class.name: T:Author
class.summary: Represents a user who can create cheeps.
class.remarks: Instances of this class map to the Authors table in the database and can have multiple associated instances. The collection contains cheeps authored by this user.

member.name: P:Author.AuthorId
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary key for the author.
member.value: An integer that uniquely identifies the author in the database.

member.name: P:Author.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the user name of the author.
member.value: The user name chosen by the author. The author display name used throughout the UI and in URLs.

member.name: P:Author.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the email address of the author.
member.value: The email address associated with the author.

member.name: P:Author.Cheeps
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of instances authored by this user.
member.remarks: may be null when not loaded from the database.
member.value: A list of instances or null if not loaded by EF.
